casebody.data:
Harry K. WASSOFF, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. AMERICAN AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY, Defendant-Appellee. No. 30923. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. May 4, 1971. Robert A. Fanning, Harlan Harper, Jr., Fanning & Harper, Dallas, Tex., for plaintiff-appellant. Franklin H. Perry, Thompson, Coe, Cousins, Irons & Porter, Dallas, Tex., for defendant-appellee.

Before O’SULLIVAN*, THORNBERRY and DYER, Circuit Judges.

Senior Circuit Judge, 6th Circuit, sitting by designation.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5th Cir. 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
